headline: Middle-Income Consumers Feel Pinched. That’s Bad for Some of America’s Best Known Brands.
summary: Middle-class and lower-income Americans are in belt-tightening mode.  McDonald’s reported its worst sales since the pandemic for established U.S. restaurants, after anxious middle- and low-income diners cut their spending.  “People are just being more judicious,” McDonald’s Chief Executive  Chris Kempczinski  told investors Thursday.

headline: McDonald's Says Middle-Income Americans Are Feeling Squeezed Now Too
summary: Low-income consumers already have been visiting the company's restaurants less, executives said Thursday, adding that traffic from both customer groups is down by nearly double digits.

headline: McDonald's (NYSE:MCD) Reports Flat Q1 2025 Earnings With Revenue Of US$5,956 Million

headline: Gloomy retail earnings show consumers are feeling the pinch of US tariffs
summary: (Reuters) -Lackluster quarterly results from consumer-facing companies including McDonald's and Harley-Davidson are the latest sign that American shoppers are curbing spending amid shifting U.S. trade policies.  McDonald's posted a surprise decline in quarterly global sales on Thursday and said it was navigating the "toughest of market conditions".  It echoed recent warnings from restaurant operators Domino's Pizza, Chipotle Mexican Grill and Starbucks that Americans were spending less on dining out.

raw.headline: Gloomy retail earnings show consumers are feeling the pinch of US tariffs

McDonald's posted a surprise decline in quarterly global sales on Thursday and said it was navigating the "toughest of market conditions".  It echoed recent warnings from restaurant operators Domino's Pizza, Chipotle Mexican Grill and Starbucks that Americans were spending less on dining out.

headline: Tesla & Elon Musk, GM outlook, McDonald's sales: Trending Tickers
summary: Brad Smith and Madison Mills outline some of today's trending tickers. Tesla (TSLA) denies reports that the company is searching for a new CEO amid concerns about Elon Musk dividing time between the company and the Trump administration. General Motors (GM) cut its full-year earnings outlook due to tariffs, as the automaker's tariff exposure may result in a hit of up to $5 billion. McDonald's (MCD) stock is under pressure after the company reported a decline in same-store sales — its biggest drop since 2020. To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Morning Brief here.

headline: McDonald's global sales post surprise drop as tariff chaos hurts consumer confidence
summary: McDonald's posted a surprise drop in first-quarter global comparable sales on Thursday, as demand from cash-strapped diners in the U.S. and Europe faltered on uncertainty sparked by chaotic tariffs.  The world's largest fast-food chain is navigating the "toughest of market conditions", CEO Chris Kempczinski said as restaurant visits by lower- and middle-income customers fell in double-digit range from last year.  The results echoed warnings from restaurant operators Domino's Pizza, Chipotle Mexican Grill and Starbucks that Americans were spending less to dine out as inflation and bleak economic outlook dent consumer confidence.

raw.headline: McDonald's global sales post surprise drop as tariff chaos hurts consumer confidence
raw.summary: McDonald's posted a surprise drop in first-quarter global comparable sales on Thursday, as demand from cash-strapped diners in the U.S. and Europe faltered on uncertainty sparked by chaotic tariffs.  The world's largest fast-food chain is navigating the "toughest of market conditions", CEO Chris Kempczinski said as restaurant visits by lower- and middle-income customers fell in double-digit range from last year.  The results echoed warnings from restaurant operators Domino's Pizza, Chipotle Mexican Grill and Starbucks that Americans were spending less to dine out as inflation and bleak economic outlook dent consumer confidence.
